title: CRM Selection for Sales Team
assumptions: Vendor B is feature-perfect, but expensive and integration is tight.
Vendor A is balanced, but API limits could be problematic.
Vendor C is affordable, but integration takes too long.
alternatives: Vendor A (€100k, 4 weeks integration, good API)
Vendor B (€120k, 6 weeks integration, perfect features)
Vendor C (€80k, 8 weeks integration, limited API)
risks: Integration delay if Vendor C is chosen
Feature gaps if Vendor A is chosen
Budget overrun if Vendor B is chosen
successCriteria: CRM live by end of Q1
clientContext: B2B SaaS company selecting CRM system for sales team.
commsContext: Monthly steering call; client expects vendor recommendation.
clientImplications: Vendor selection impacts integration timeline and budget.
goal: Select CRM vendor that balances features, budget, and integration timeline.
